title: Google PageSpeed Insights
description: A tool that analyzes the loading speed of a website and suggests improvements to optimize resources.

title: GTmetrix
description: A tool that provides a detailed analysis of your website's performance and recommendations for improving speed.

title: Pingdom
description: A tool for measuring your website's load time from different locations and receiving optimization recommendations.

title: WebPageTest
description: An online service that allows you to measure your website's performance, providing details on load speed and recommendations.

title: ImageOptim
description: Compresses images to reduce file size without losing quality, optimizing web page performance.

title: Uptimerobot
description: A tool that monitors your website's uptime and performance and sends alerts in case of outages or resource issues.

title: LazyLoad
description: A JavaScript library that optimizes the loading of images and other resources by loading them only when visible in the viewport.

title: Cloudflare
description: A content delivery network (CDN) and web optimization service that accelerates your site by reducing latency and minimizing resource usage.

title: TinyPNG
description: A tool for compressing PNG and JPEG images that reduces file size without losing visual quality.

title: Font Squirrel Webfont Generator
description: A tool that allows you to optimize and generate web fonts compatible with all browsers.
